main event: One object was observed in Apache Junction, Iowa, on March 27, 1967, for 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as round and bright light yellowish in color., A piece of the object was seen dropping fire to the ground., The object changed direction from north to south, then east., There is a mention of children making hot air balloons that may have caused similar sightings in the area., The report concluded the sighting was due to a hot air balloon.
